Name: Butterfly 3. Funny Twins.
About the game: The third part of the puzzle-platformer game Butterfly - Funny Twins! Enjoy the new 40 levels of original design! Your logical and platformer skills are required! Game Features You control two caterpillars at the same time; The caterpillars can’t jump on their own - find a way to complete platformer levels! Bounce off the enemies to your advantage! Use pipes – while one caterpillar is in the pipe, the other can move in either direction! Put one caterpillar in a secluded place so the other still free to go! Manage this active team of twins tied by your fingers! Platform skills are useful, but try to find a simple logical solution! . And check if you missed the first and second parts:
